issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Implement basic PartitionScheme
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6494](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6494). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The PartitionScheme interface parses paths and yields the partition expressions which are encoded in those paths. For example, the Hive partition scheme would yield `"a"_ = 2 and "b"_ = 3` from "a=2/b=3/\*.parquet".

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6494?focusedCommentId=16943783) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5443
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5443>
